Summary: there were two and they were red
trends: There have been no other sightings in by lenore
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live by Orofino Idaho,about 21 miles from the Dwarshack Dam.On the night of 911 my husband and i were in our hot tub,we live right on the river,Clearwater River,and we saw two big red circular objects up in the sky.I called 911 and said that i thought that no airplanes were supposed to be flying except military,i said that i saw two red circles and then they dissapeard,they hung up on me.Well it was a clear night and i know what i saw!I was looking at the sky as i often do,then the two objects just came from the north and stayed at the westerly position for about 10 to 15 minutes then they looked like they went off to the east were Dwarshack dam is and just dissapeard.Jill
